General.Name: Precot Limited
General.Description: Precot Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of yarn and technical textile products in India. It offers hygienic products, such as cotton pads and balls, exfoliating pads, cotton wool rolls and pleats, cotton spunlace rolls/tapes, and absorbent cotton fiber. The company also provides cotton yarns and threads for weaving, crocheting, sewing, and textile production. Its products are used for cosmetic, personal hygiene, and medical use. The company exports its products. Precot Limited was incorporated in 1962 and is based in Coimbatore, India.
General.Address: SF No: 559/4, D Block, Coimbatore, India, 641028
